summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new features: Class-B branding, Classi chatbot, and HS code auto-suggest. All features working correctly.
passed_tests: Login page shows 'Class-B HS Code Agent' branding
Login page shows 'Bahamas HS Code Classification System' subtitle
Sidebar shows 'Class-B Agent' branding after login
Classi chat toggle button appears in bottom-right corner after login
Classi chat window opens when button is clicked
Classi chat shows Bahamian flag SVG avatar
Classi chat shows greeting message with help topics
Classi chat has quick action buttons
Classi responds to user messages (GPT-5.2 integration working)
HS code auto-suggest endpoint works - GET /api/hs-codes/suggest?q=wine
HS code search in library returns matching codes
HSCodeAutoSuggest component integrated in ClassificationResultPage edit modal
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features (Class-B branding, Classi chatbot with GPT-5.2, HS code auto-suggest) are fully functional. The Classi chat uses the /api/classi/chat endpoint with GPT-5.2 via Emergent LLM Key. The HS auto-suggest uses /api/hs-codes/suggest endpoint querying MongoDB hs_codes collection. HSCodeAutoSuggest component is used in ClassificationResultPage for editing classification items.

branding.subtitle: Bahamas HS Code Classification System - verified

classi_chat.toggle_button: Bottom-right corner, visible after login - verified

hs_code_autosuggest.returns_suggestions: Array of HS codes with code, description, chapter, duty_rate, is_restricted, requires_permit - verified
hs_code_autosuggest.short_query_handling: Returns empty for queries < 2 chars - verified
hs_code_autosuggest.frontend_integration: Used in ClassificationResultPage edit modal - verified
